name: Is This an Empty World?
description:
3 day(+12 hours) making this game

The idea from  the "Empy world" theme is a sensation of emptyness in a dark enviroment. 

Search the purple things an comeback to win

Mobile compatibility (horizontal) 

PD: couldn't sleep because I got an error due to I disabled somnthing to take a screenshot (-1000 iq), good night guys XD
